ValidationRule.description: When an Opportunity is moved to Booking Review or Deal Won, lock the opportunity from being edited.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Deal Won') || ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Booking Review'),(ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(StageName), 'Deal Won')), NOT($Profile.Name = "Grafana Finance"), NOT($Profile.Name = "Grafana Deal Desk"), NOT($Profile.Name = "System Administrator"), NOT($Profile.Name = "Grafana System Admin Lite"), NOT($Profile.Name = "Grafana Integration Applications"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When the stage is in Booking Review or Deal Won, only Finance, Sales Ops or Deal Ops can modify the opportunity.
